name: tatami-ng
description: Cross JavaScript runtime benchmarking library and CLI

scripts.test:deno: deno run --allow-sys --allow-hrtime tests/test.js && deno run --allow-sys --allow-hrtime tests/test.ts
scripts.cli:node: npx rimraf tatami && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && npx ncp $(volta which node || n which lts || nvm which node || command -v node) tatami && npx postject tatami NODE_SEA_BLOB tatami.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && npx rimraf tatami.blob
scripts.cli:deno: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write npm:rimraf tatami && deno compile --allow-read --allow-run --allow-sys --allow-hrtime --output=tatami ./cli.js
scripts.cli:bun: bunx rimraf tatami && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap ./cli.js --outfile tatami
